tool_description: An API containing Liverpool F.C articles from The Guardian, The Times, Telegraph, BBC, Standard and The Sun newspapers football section.
name: Liverpool Latest Articles
title: Liverpool Latest Articles

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get Liverpool F.C news from specific newspaper.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://liverpool-latest-articles.p.rapidapi.com/football/thegaurdian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liverpool-latest-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Liverpool F.C news
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide you with all Liverpool F.C news from 5 of the most popular U.K newspapers.
